UPDATE [BpTECNOFRUIT].[dbo].[CntPay]
SET [Payed]=1, [PayedDate]=[ItemDate]
WHERE [CntPayID] not in (
7658,8961,9254,9256,9892,9894,10201,10203,10212,10246,10258,10444,10560,10562,11221,11224,11225,11299,11405,11426,11435,11505,11628,11629,11645,11648,11650,11651,11654,11656,11659,11674,11707,11820,11833,11847,11889,11892,11897,11997,12086,12098,12088,12089,12091,12107,12121,12125,12172,12209,12229,12238,12247,12252,12253,12254,12270,12271,12273,12274,12307,12313,12314,12321,12322,12324,12325,12326,12330,12334,12335,12342,12343
) and [DocTip] in (15,16)

fattura -> registra incasso
estratti conti e solleciti
